go_data.justification: Introduction of specific engineered mutations affecting its SNARE motif has been reported to alter vesicle fusion in vitro by impairing either formation of the SNARE complex.
Introduction of specific engineered mutations affecting its SNARE motif has been reported to alter vesicle fusion in vitro.
Vamp2-/- mice present severely decreased rates of both spontaneous and Ca2+-triggered synaptic-vesicle fusion.
VAMP2 exerts a complex influence on synaptic transmission; it plays fundamental roles in vesicle fusion, neurotransmitter release, and vesicle endocytosis.
